# 南京大学计算机科学与技术系计算机系统基础课程实验 2021

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/nanjingdaxue-jisuanjikexue-yu-jishu-xi-jisuanjixitong-jichu-kecheng-shiyan-2021
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/nanjingdaxue-jisuanjikexue-yu-jishu-xi-jisuanjixitong-jichu-kecheng-shiyan-2021
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install nanjingdaxue-jisuanjikexue-yu-jishu-xi-jisuanjixitong-jichu-kecheng-shiyan-2021
nanjingdaxue-jisuanjikexue-yu-jishu-xi-jisuanjixitong-jichu-kecheng-shiyan-2021 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g nanjingdaxue-jisuanjikexue-yu-jishu-xi-jisuanjixitong-jichu-kecheng-shiyan-erlingeryi
nanjingdaxue-jisuanjikexue-yu-jishu-xi-jisuanjixitong-jichu-kecheng-shiyan-erlingeryi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
